title: Get language learning now for only $149.97 with this special holiday offer
content:
Macworld

Look, anybody can give a book or a sweater or tech like a tablet or a laptop for Christmas. Buying stuff is easy. Instead of giving things this year, consider giving something even more precious: knowledge. 

You can literally open someone up to the world with a lifetime subscription to Babbel Language Learning, on sale through December 17 at the exclusive online price of just $149.97.

Babbel has over 10 million subscribers around the world, making it one of the best ways to learn a new language anywhere in a short amount of time. While Babbel leverages technology to its advantage, the foundation of its system is based on a tried-and-true approach: intensive communication with a native language speaker to begin the language learning process.

Across the 14 languages under Babbel’s umbrella, learners will be able to access thousands of hours’ worth of learning content, each in the form of easy-to-follow, 10- to-15-minute lessons around a single topic. 

From classic lectures to interactive games, podcasts and projects, and everything in between, users will be able to quickly pick up and use words and phrases related to topics such as food, weather or family life.

Each lesson adds to a learner’s existing knowledge, helping you develop strong communication skills quickly. Meanwhile, Babbel’s speech-recognition system provides constant feedback on grammar, pronunciation, and vocabulary, while offering opportunities for additional practice in areas that could use some improvement.

A lifetime of access to all 14 languages found in Babbel Language Learning would usually run you nearly $600, but with this special holiday offer, it’s now just $149.97 until December 17 at 11:59pm Pacific.
